detectors.description: CovidGambit.sneeze(address) (src/CovidGambit.sol#126-145) uses a weak PRNG: isPatientZero(30,target) (src/CovidGambit.sol#138)
CovidGambit._beforeTokenTransfer(address,address,uint256) (src/CovidGambit.sol#99-124) uses a weak PRNG: isPatientZero(10,to) && ! isInfected(to) (src/CovidGambit.sol#116)
CovidGambit.isPatientZero(uint256,address) (src/CovidGambit.sol#225-228) uses a weak PRNG: dna <= chance (src/CovidGambit.sol#227)
